ABOUT.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to MM Workout Planner, your ultimate workout companion designed specifically for beginners in the gym. In a place where fitness knowledge is limited, our app is here to bridge the gap and empower the youth to take their first steps towards a healthier lifestyle.
ABOUT.FITNESS_JOURNEY: Whether you're new to the gym or just starting your fitness journey, MM Workout Planner provides you with a comprehensive library of workouts, complete with step-by-step instructions, images, and videos. Our goal is to make fitness accessible, understandable, and achievable for everyone in our community. With MM Workout Planner, you'll have all the tools and guidance you need to confidently navigate your workouts and build a stronger, healthier you.
